text:
Timescale | New York, NY | Stockholm, Sweden | ONSITE | FULL-TIME

Time-series data is everywhere, and the powerful time-series database we are developing (TimescaleDB) is a key building block across a range of industries: IoT, DevOps, monitoring, eventing, finance, industrial, logistics, transportation, and via the edge, on premise, and cloud deployments. It powers users' core products.

We need extraordinary engineers and customer success professionals to join our team in NYC and Stockholm.

- Core database engineers

- R&D engineers

- Support engineers

- Customer success manager

- Office/marketing manager

Check out our careers page for openings: http://www.timescale.com/careers
